user_query: I'm organizing a family reunion in Orlando and need to find the nearest cities within a 50-mile radius for a day trip.

TaskList.description: Query the geographic database for cities within a 50-mile radius of Orlando.
Filter the cities to find the five largest based on population.
Retrieve the distance to Orlando for each of the five largest cities.
Query the population data for each of the five largest cities.
Retrieve local time and time zone information for each of the five cities.
